content.title: ğŸš  Modify Buttons Of Master Channel #{index}

Modifying buttons will impact the dynamic channels created by __Master Channel #{index}__.

There are have two options:

- Affect changes immediately to all channels
- Apply changes only to newly created _Dynamic Channels_.

content.title: ğŸ›   Setup Vertix
content.description:
Discover the limitless possibilities of **Vertix**!
Customize and optimize your server to perfection.

To create a new master channel just click:
"`(â• Create Master Channel)`" button.

Master Channels are dynamic voice channel generators, each with its own unique configuration.

Our badwords feature enables guild-level configuration for limiting dynamic channel names.

_**Current master channels**_:
{masterChannelMessage}

_Current badwords_:
{badwordsMessage}

content.title: ğŸ¤·  You have reached your master channels limit
content.description: You can create up to **{maxMasterChannels}** Master Channels in total.

content.title: Step 1 - Set Dynamic Channels Template Name
content.description:
You can specify a default name for dynamic channels that will be used when they are opened.

_Current template name_:
`{dynamicChannelNameTemplate}`

You can keep the default settings by pressing the "**Next**" button.

content.title: Step 2 - Dynamic Channels Setup

footer.{defaultFooter}: Members who create dynamic channels using this master channel will only see the buttons you have selected, you can select the buttons using the menu below
footer.{noButtonsFooter}: Note: Without buttons members will not be able to manage their dynamic channels. no embed or interface will be shown to them.

content.title: à¼„ Vertix is here, let's get started!
content.description:
Welcome to Vertix, an incredible addition to your server!
Let's collaborate and make your server even better.

**Bot Setup**
Setting up the bot is a breeze! Just follow these simple steps:
- Type `/setup` to create your first master channel.
- Click on "`(â• Create Master Channel)`".
- Modify default channel names or click "`(â–¶ Next)`" to proceed.
- Choose channel buttons or continue with all features, then click "`(âœ” Finish)`".

Congratulations! Your master channel has been created. ğŸ‰

You can always modify the configurations by using the `/setup` command.

**Dynamic Channels and Master Channel**
Dynamic channels inherit all settings from the Master Channel.
To modify the default settings of dynamic channels, simply adjust the settings of the Master Channel `(â• New Channel)`.

**Buttons Interface**
Please note that the buttons interface is located **inside** the dynamic channel.
You can access it by opening the chat box of the dynamic channel.

If you need assistance or have any suggestions, feel free to join our Discord community server! We would be glad to help you and hear your feedback.
Join us at: https://discord.gg/dEwKeQefUU
